intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: At last. King Garon...

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: I'm so glad you made it home.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Heh. Heh. Young Prince/Princess Corrin. It has been a while, hasn't it. For someone who spent much of his/her life as a pampered shut-in... You've achieved something approaching competence.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Gee, thanks for the compliment. As I'm sure you're aware...we're here to dethrone you. You've sparked a needless war that has claimed thousands of innocent lives. Including my mother's...and those of your own children. Xander and Elise.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Hmm. I am surprised to hear that. Xander in particular was quite a capable pawn.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: A capable pawn? Your own son? Do you feel nothing at their deaths? What happened to you, old man?

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: How dare you insult me! Of course my own children were pawns. As are you. AS IS EVERYONE HERE!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander and Elise thought of you until the very end! They fought and died trying to save you from my blade! Yet you feel no remorse?! You are clearly beyond redemption or negotiation. The only thing left is to do is end your reign...and your life.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Bwahaha!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I...I can't even scratch his armor...

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: What did you expect? Attacking me with that pitiful letter opener you call a sword... Let me show you how it is done!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Corrin! Are you OK?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm fine, Azura. He's not so tough.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Psst... Get ready. I'm going to sing my song now... He'll be vulnerable for a moment or two—so attack immediately! *ahem*

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: I don't think so.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Azura! Let her go, Garon!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Don't even think about it. You'll never hear her pretty voice again. If any of you wish to escape here with your lives, I demand total surrender!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Forget...about...me. Just...attack him!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I...I can't!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Hold it! Let's hear what he has to say before Azura gets hurt. King Garon... What are your demands? If you are reasonable, I'm sure that Nohr and Hoshido can come to an agreement. Now, please...let Azura go so that we can discuss this.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Wise decision. I demand nothing less than total, unconditional surrender from Hoshido. You are to transfer control of your kingdom to Nohr immediately. Also...I require your life. BAHAHA!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: No! Ryoma!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Watch out, Corrin. He's more powerful than I imagined...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: This negotiation is a sham! I won't let anyone else die today!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: BAHAHA! What are you going to do about it, exactly? Will you drop your pathetic sword and surrender to me? Or will you fight—and ensure the deaths of all your friends?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I don't understand... When I attacked him earlier, it was like my sword just bounced off Garon's armor... That never happened before. I need to figure out a way to hurt him...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: You're right. We need more power...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Look... Raijinto is glowing!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Is Garon doing that? What's going on?

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: I don't think so. Remember when my Fujin Yumi combined with Yato? It's happening again!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: So that means Raijinto is— Urgh!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Corrin!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Noble Yato is...changing somehow...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: I can feel a new power coursing through Raijinto as well...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: This must be what the Rainbow Sage was talking about... The Seal of Flames! Our three weapons are unlocking something amazing... Noble Yato is becoming...Blazing Yato!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Call it whatever you like. It still has no hope of penetrating my defenses.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Perhaps you're right. But there's only one way to know for sure. Hyaaah!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: GRAAAH! That...actually hurt...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Azura, now's your chance!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Thank you, Corrin!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: You've just sealed your fate. Prepare to die. I'll cast your soul into the eternal darkness of Nohr! Soldiers! Surround them!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Wrong. Blazing Yato gives me the power to bring light to your kingdom of darkness! Your reign is practically over, Garon!

boss.speaker: Garon
boss.line: HAH! Corrin should have known better than to send an underling. Or perhaps you're just a sacrificial lamb...

boss.speaker: Garon
boss.line: You're like a cockroach to me... How can you possibly think you can win?

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: I've grown, Garon. I'm not a victim anymore. And I WILL defeat you!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I did it... I really did it... Soldiers of Nohr! Lay down your weapons! Garon is defeated! Our next order of business is forging a peace treaty as soon as possible.

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: NOW YOU SEE MY TRUE FORM. THE BLOOD OF THE DRAGONS RUNS IN MY VEINS—AS IT DOES YOURS. WITNESS MY POWER UNLEASHED!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: *cough* *cough* No! He destroyed the Blazing Yato! HOW?!

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: BAHAHA! EVEN I AM SURPRISED. I EXPECTED MORE FROM HOSHIDO'S MOST FEARSOME WEAPON.

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: Hold fast, Corrin! Blazing Yato may be destroyed, but I can still attack with the power of Raijinto!

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: YOUR WEAPONS ARE MERE TOYS AGAINST ME.

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: YOUR ALLIES ARE WEAK. I WILL DESTROY THEM NOW.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: You can't! I...I'll protect them... Somehow...

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: Corrin! Stop hurting him/her, you monster!

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: What were you thinking, moving in front of his attack like that? You could have been killed!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: You worry too much, Brother... I'm fine. I can keep fighting. I can stop him. I can... Urgh...
